title: Yellow gloves
creator_credit: Lyn Johnson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Originally a city girl, Lyn Johnson wondered if she was cut out to be a farmers wife but a pair of yellow gloves changed everything. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
creator_credit_for_label: Lyn Johnson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
